title: Cycled
description: No matter how hard Scarlett tried to be good, she always ended up being bad.But everything was different now. She was making her way up the ranks in her dream job, working as a publicist for the San Francisco Gold.Finally, her life was back on track.Then she met Kaydon.He was new to the team—a power forward—and the moment she laid eyes on his sexy-as-sin body she’d dreamed about what that power might feel like in bed. But he was off-limits. She worked for the team, and though she’d spent much of her life being bad, she couldn’t risk her job by jumping into a relationship that could easily get her fired.Even if it was with a man like Kaydon.Unfortunately, despite her best intentions at keeping her distance, he was good—very good—at convincing her to be bad.
author: Elise Faber
